description: Try our easy to follow Tuna Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tuna salad,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Fish,Soy free,Wheat free,Kale,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Tuna Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 95g tin tuna in springwater, drained, flaked

recipeInstructions.text: Combine 1 cup cooked barley, 30g trimmed kale, chopped, 1 Roma tomato, diced, 95g tin tuna in springwater, drained, flaked, and 1 tbs chopped parsley. Add 1 tbs lemon juice and 1 tsp olive oil and toss to combine. Divide between 2 airtight containers and pack 1 into lunch box. The second container will keep in the fridge for up to 2 days.
